name: bulky mosaic beanie
notes:
pdf digital download crochet pattern - english only

written in standard american terms
skill level: intermediate

the crochet bulky mosaic beanie is a crochet pattern with a video tutorial. enjoy winter with a modern and stylish mosaic crochet hat. mosaic crochet is a quick and easy technique to create beautiful colourwork patterns. the crochet bulky mosaic beanie will quickly become a family favourite in sizing from baby to large adult. designed in chroma twist bulky yarn from wecrochet. so many gorgeous colours to choose from!

**yarn**
wecrochet chroma twist bulky  weight - 70% superwash wool, 30% nylon (127 yds/100g) - https://shrsl.com/3cn1y
yarn a (hanks): 1 (1, 1, 1)
yarn b (hanks): 1 (1, 1, 1)
a: 65 (80, 105, 120) yards 
b: 45 (50, 75, 85) yards

**materials**
j/10 6mm crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge - https://shrsl.com/36nzt use code mjs15 for 15% off
tapestry needle
faux fur pom pom - https://www.amazon.com/dp/b07z5ry9j7?ref=exp_mjsoffthehookdesigns_dp_vv_d&th=1
garment tags
leather rivets 

**gauge**
13 sts and 13 rows equal to 4" in sc blo with 6mm hook
8 sts and 12 rows equal to 2" in sl st band with 6mm hook

video link - https://youtu.be/kvyoekfgbmy
